name: car-service
description: Easy and convenient way to register cars and their repairs.

scripts.gh-pages-deploy: npm run gh-pages-build && npm run gh-pages-create && npm run gh-pages-publish
scripts.gh-pages-build: set BRANCH=gh-pages&& npm run build && copy dist\index.html dist\404.html
scripts.gh-pages-create: git rev-parse --verify --quiet gh-pages || (git branch gh-pages && git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages)
scripts.gh-pages-publish: gh-pages --dist=dist --message="build: deploy dist for github pages"

author: Deyan 'stambolievv' Stamboliev
